name: Pall (Xylarthen)
description:
It's very rough around the edges, but it's a first game, so I'm proud of it regardless. I highly recommend a controller.

Pall is the story of an alien who hears a crash far above his cave home, and goes on a journey to hopefully meet this new potential friend! It is a roguelite metroidvania.

Many thanks to the people running the 7DRL game jam for providing this opportunity!
